title: Paul Pelosi, Husband of House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, Arrested on Drunken-Driving Charges; Mr. Pelosi was released Sunday morning on $5000 bail; Mrs. Pelosi wasn't with her husband at the time
text:
Mrs. Pelosi wasn't with her husband at the time, and earlier Sunday delivered the commencement address at Brown University in Rhode Island.

"The speaker will not be commenting on this private matter which occurred while she was on the East Coast," said Drew Hammill, spokesman for Mrs. Pelosi.

Mr. Pelosi, 82 years old, owns and operates Financial Leasing Services, a San Francisco-based investment firm. He and Mrs. Pelosi, who married in 1963, own a home and vineyard in Napa County.

Mrs. Pelosi is one of the wealthiest members of Congress. Her finances have attracted more scrutiny recently as the House has mulled rules to restrict stock trading, including by spouses of senators and House lawmakers. The speaker disclosed a number of trades made by her husband in 2021, including in shares of Amazon.com Inc. and Apple Inc.

Write to Gwynn Guilford at gwynn.guilford@wsj.com

Paul Pelosi, Husband of House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, Arrested on Drunken-Driving Charges
